content: @Alex Crichton Can you briefly comment on why it's useful to shield downstream from #[cfg] (wrt wasmtime #764)?
Oh, having typed that, I think I figured it out. If downstream crates want to support lightbeam, it means they don't need their own cargo feature
I'm thinking of making new Wasmtime packages for crates.io soon
Anyone know of anything in progress which we should wait for?
